special_travelFlow_enable.label: Turn-off Retraction
special_travelFlow_enable.description: The particle machine is suitable for this function: if this function is enabled, the empty path length is within the specified range, and the empty path can be converted into a print path, which is executed with a small flow rate

special_advance_enable.label: Advance Enable
special_advance_enable.description: If it is pellet machine, then have advance function

special_model_centric.label: Model Centric
special_model_centric.description: Take the center of the model as the origin of the coordinate axis

set_small_feature_grading.label: Set Small Feature Grading
set_small_feature_grading.description: Whether To Set Graded Treatment Of Small Feature.

special_small_feature_max_length_1.label: Small Feature Max Length 1
special_small_feature_max_length_1.description: Feature outlines that are shorter than this length will be printed using Small Feature Speed.

special_small_feature_speed_factor_1.label: Small Feature Speed 1
special_small_feature_speed_factor_1.description: Small features will be printed at this percentage of their normal print speed. Slower printing can help with adhesion and accuracy.

special_small_feature_speed_factor_0_1.label: Small Feature Initial Layer Speed 1
special_small_feature_speed_factor_0_1.description: Small features on the first layer will be printed at this percentage of their normal print speed. Slower printing can help with adhesion and accuracy.

special_cool_min_layer_time_1.label: Minimum Layer Time 1
special_cool_min_layer_time_1.description: The minimum time spent in a layer. This forces the printer to slow down, to at least spend the time set here in one layer. This allows the printed material to cool down properly before printing the next layer. Layers may still take shorter than the minimal layer time if Lift Head is disabled and if the Minimum Speed would otherwise be violated.

special_small_feature_max_length_2.label: Small Feature Max Length 2
special_small_feature_max_length_2.description: Feature outlines that are shorter than this length will be printed using Small Feature Speed.

special_small_feature_speed_factor_2.label: Small Feature Speed 2

special_small_feature_speed_factor_0_2.label: Small Feature Initial Layer Speed 2

special_angle_per_step.label: Angle Per Step
special_angle_per_step.description: Angle Per Step of 4axis 3DP Slice Rotation.
